ModMetaData.name: 更多地图随机种子 More Map Seeds
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
添加了更多地图生成时使用的种子，目前新增的种子文本只有中文，并大部分由ChatGPT生成，如果需要为其他语言添加种子，请参考Languages/English的目录结构，并增添想要的内容。 Add more words to use for map generation. Currently, only Chinese words are added, and most of them are generated by ChatGPT. If you need to add seeds for other languages, please refer to the directory structure of Languages/English and add the content you want following similar structures.
本模组使用了Harmony Patch，并未使用最简单的解决方案，这是考虑到未来可能需要调整种子生成的规则，比如完全禁用原版种子生成，比如调整新增种子生成的概率等等场景，这些扩展功能并不保证会实现。 This mod uses Harmony Patch and does not use the simplest solution. This is because it may be necessary to adjust the rules of seed generation in the future, such as completely disabling the original seed generation, adjusting the probability of generating new seeds, and other senarios. These extended features are not guaranteed to be implemented.
